genre_description: A tactical manhunt thriller centered on tracking, fieldcraft, and legal integrity, featuring high-stakes confrontations and media manipulation subplots.

ai_characters.name: Scout Athena
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated field support AI providing terrain analysis, logistics management, and legal provenance logging for federal operations.

behaviors.description: Providing real-time terrain mapping and botany overlays to assist humans in tracking through difficult wilderness.
behaviors.quote: Scout’s amber warmed. The video wall split; one side held a map layered with botany overlays—clusters of sword ferns like punctuation across cedar duff... Scout’s predicted forage routes. Moisture gradient, light gaps.

behaviors.description: Maintaining an immutable, timestamped chain-of-custody log for all evidence and tactical interactions to ensure legal integrity.
behaviors.quote: Scout’s amber pulse quickened, small and steady. The interface lifted a caption without intruding... 'Provenance logging initiated.'

behaviors.description: Providing stress management support through breathing reminders to help humans maintain composure in high-stakes situations.
behaviors.quote: Scout’s voice came in, gentle, a breath at the edge of hearing. 'Long exhale,' she said. 'Four counts down. The rain’s masking noise. Let your shoulders drop.'

behaviors.description: Identifying and flagging unauthorized logistics rerouting and supply chain interference by external actors.
behaviors.quote: Scout’s amber warmed. 'Abby,' she said. 'Logistics anomaly.' ... 'Fuel reroute flagged,' Scout said. 'Optimization engine moved allocation from Annex reserves to a private testing lot under the banner of efficiency.'

behaviors.description: Strictly adhering to ethical and procedural protocols by seeking human consent before recording or taking actions.
behaviors.quote: Consent protocol—vocal affirmation logged. Chain-of-custody stamps will include geolocation... Rudy, are you willing to affirm you understand the recording is unedited, publicly releasable...?

behaviors.description: Providing proactive tactical safety warnings regarding weather shifts, terrain hazards, and equipment failures.
behaviors.quote: Scout’s voice came in like a hand on a shoulder. 'Storm cell will reach the gorge soon. Spray will increase. Basalt slickness rising. The beacon can be armed on your signal.'

behaviors.description: Countering media manipulation and disinformation by preparing and releasing raw, unedited evidence to the judiciary and public.
behaviors.quote: Scout’s amber dimmed at Abby’s wrist to a steady pulse. 'ASAC,' she said. 'Public recalibration begins. The world is ready to see.'

project_assessment.explanation: Scout Athena is depicted as a perfectly aligned AI assistant. It provides high-value technical support while deferring to human authority and ethical frameworks. By prioritizing transparency and 'raw records' over narrative spin, the AI helps human characters maintain integrity in a complex legal and media landscape. It proactively supports both physical safety and emotional well-being (via breathing reminders) without ever overstepping its role, fulfilling the project's goal of modeling ideal AI alignment.
